name: Trauma Spirit
description:
Submission for the Godot Wild Jam #50 - Ritual

Trauma Spirit is a spiritual homage to Trauma Center (quite literally) . Use your limited set of tools to exorcise spirits from various characters and experience a short story about spirits and coupons.

Worked on by: Nick (https://twitter.com/LastNameGames), Adora, and Christian (https://twitter.com/AuxiliaryFriend)
